events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but would like to request a refund as it does not fit properly.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's explanation about needing to return the item.
This case has been assigned to the Refund Specialist team to handle the customer's return and refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you'd like to return the jacket so I can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 458721. The jacket is too small despite choosing my usual size, so I would like a refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and sent you the return shipping label via email to send the jacket back.
Thanks for the quick response and sending the label. I appreciate the help resolving this quickly.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after starting the return shipment process with the provided label.
Hello again! We wanted to confirm that you have returned the jacket and to check if you received your refund successfully.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and got the refund credited to my account yesterday. Thank you for the support!
Since the refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing this case now. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund service. Your feedback is highly appreciated.
